summary: Adds yet another follower to Tamriel
descriptionHtml:
Location: Stillborn Cave (coc stillborncave01) See Map
Health, Magicka and Stamina: 500
Class: Spellsword
Height: 1.0
Weight: 50
Marriageable 
Essential

[youtube]dPutSShkC0Y[/youtube]

(1) If using AFT or UFO remember after installing this to move them BELOW my follower so you will get no errors and blame me for them. 

(2) This companion was created to use YOUR Meshes and Textures and only relies on hair, brow and eye textures. This is done mainly to benefit the player who does not want 23 followers putting a huge load in their games with unnecessary bs. 

(3) If you would like to be in my good graces for future mods then I suggest you follow the rules like the rest of us and not act like an idiot in the forums. If you are having issues with my mod submit a bug report. If you think there is something wrong with say, my choice of hair, face design etc. Move on because really, who listen's to you anyway and furthermore, can end in a perma ban from my files. This is to everyone's benefit that we keep the forums clean and positive.
author: Kittyness
